Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1155 COLEMAN AVENUE, SAN JOSE, California, 95110, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Roku is the leading streaming platform in the U.S. by hours watched with under 59 billion hours of content streamed in 2020. The firm's eponymous operating system is used not only in Roku's own hardware but in co-branded TVs and soundbars from manufacturers like TCL, Onn, and Hisense. Roku generates revenue from advertising, distribution fees, hardware sales, OS licensing, and subscription sales.
